#include<stdio.h>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<string.h>
char c[10000002],d[10000002],b[10000002];
int main()
{
    long long int a[27],r,k,t,i,g;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%s",b);
              r=k=0;
              for(i=0;i<27;i++)
              a[i]=0;
              g=strlen(b);
              for(i=0;i<g;i++)
              {
                                      a[b[i]-'A']++;
                                      if(a[b[i]-'A']%2!=0)
                                      c[k++]=b[i];
                                      else
                                      d[r++]=b[i];
              }
              c[k]=d[r]='\0';
              if((strcmp(c,d)==0)&&(k+r==g))
              printf("%s\n",c);
              else
              printf("Twins don't exist\n");
    }
   // getch();
    return 0;
}
